summary: U.N.C.L.E. agents Napoleon Solo and Ilyia Kuryakin are sent to stop a T.H.R.U.S.H. employed ex-Nazi scientist from diverting the Gulf Stream.
cast: Robert Vaughn|David McCallum|Jack Palance|Janet Leigh|Eduardo Ciannelli|Allen Jenkins|Jack La Rue|Leo G. Carroll|Joan Blondell|Ludwig Donath|Will Kuluva|Letícia Román|Penny Santon|Frank Puglia|Vincent Beck|Maxie Rosenbloom|Vince Barnett|Elisha Cook Jr.|James Almanzar|Clarke Gordon|Jesslyn Fax|Jimmy Bates|David Renard|Sharyn Hillyer
title: The Spy in the Green Hat
